title: Simplify Development Task UI by removing unnecessary branch management links
description: Clean up the Development Task interface by removing Branch, PR creation, and Rebase links that clutter the UI and confuse users, creating a streamlined experience focused on core task management functionality
iWant: to have a simplified Development Task UI without Branch, PR created, and Rebase links
soThat: I can focus on essential task management without UI clutter and confusion from unnecessary branch operations
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is removed from Development Task interface
PR created and ready for development link is removed
Rebase link is removed from the UI
Core Development Task functionality remains intact and accessible
